required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Assess the Effect of Food on HR20033 and Pharmacokinetic After Multiple Dose in Healthy Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-centre, Parallel-cohort, Open-label Study to Assess the Food Effect and Multiple Dose Pharmacokinetic of the HR20033in Healthy Chinese Subjects

brief_summary.textblock:
According to the objective, the trial is constituted by two study groups: one is food effect assessment group, and another is multiple dose pharmacokinetic assessment group.
The primary objective is to (1) assess the effect of a meal (light-fat) on the single-dose PK of SHR3824 and metformin administered in the HR20033 FDC tablet in healthy Chinese subjects; (2) to characterize the single-dose and steady-state PK of SHR3824 and metformin following administration of the HR20033 FDC tablet to healthy subjects in the fed state.
The secondary objective is to assess in healthy Chinese subjects, the safety and tolerability of the SHR3824 and Metformin after single doses (administered in the fed and fasted states) and multiple doses (administered in the fed state) of the HR20033 FDC tablet.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: According to the objective, the trial is constituted by two study groups: one is food effect assessment group, and another is multiple dose pharmacokinetic assessment group. There will be 18 (food effect cohort) and 10 (multiple dose pharmacokinetics) volunteers to receive the treatment, and each treatment will be followed by 72 hours of blood sampling for pharmacokinetic assessments, with safety and tolerability.

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics parameters of SHR3824 and Metformin in the fasted and fed state: Cmax
primary_outcome.time_frame: Based on pre-dose, 0.5-72 hours post-dose sampling times on Day 1 and Day 8

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics parameters of SHR3824 and Metformin in the fasted and fed state: AUC0-t
primary_outcome.time_frame: Based on pre-dose, 0.5-72 hours post-dose sampling times on Day 1 and Day 8

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics parameters of SHR3824 and Metformin in the fasted and fed state: AUC0-inf
primary_outcome.time_frame: Based on pre-dose, 0.5-72 hours post-dose sampling times on Day 1 and Day 8

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics parameters of SHR3824 and Metformin after single and multiple dose: Cmax
primary_outcome.time_frame: Based on pre-dose, 0.5-72 hours post-dose on day 1 and Day 11, pre-dose on Day 8, Day 9, Day 10 sampling times

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics parameters of SHR3824 and Metformin after single and multiple dose: AUC0-inf
primary_outcome.time_frame: Based on pre-dose, 0.5-72 hours post-dose on day 1 and Day 11, pre-dose on Day 8, Day 9, Day 10 sampling times

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics parameters of SHR3824 and Metformin after multiple dose: Cmax，ss
primary_outcome.time_frame: Based on pre-dose, 0.5-72 hours post-dose on day 1 and Day 11, pre-dose on Day 8, Day 9, Day 10 sampling times

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics parameters of SHR3824 and Metformin after multiple dose: AUCss
primary_outcome.time_frame: Based on pre-dose, 0.5-72 hours post-dose on day 1 and Day 11, pre-dose on Day 8, Day 9, Day 10 sampling times

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics parameters of SHR3824 and Metformin in the fasted and fed state: Tmax
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Based on pre-dose, 0.5-72 hours post-dose sampling times on Day 1 and Day 8

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics parameters of SHR3824 and Metformin in the fasted and fed state: Vz/F

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics parameters of SHR3824 and Metformin in the fasted and fed state: CL/F
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Based on pre-dose, 0.5-72 hours post-dose sampling times on Day 1 and Day 8

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics parameters of SHR3824 and Metformin in the fasted and fed state: t1/2
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Based on pre-dose, 0.5-72 hours post-dose sampling times on Day 1 and Day 8

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics parameters of SHR3824 and Metformin after single and multiple dose: Tmax
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Based on pre-dose, 0.5-72 hours post-dose sampling times on Day 1 and Day 8

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics parameters of SHR3824 and Metformin after single and multiple dose: Ctrough
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Based on pre-dose, 0.5-72 hours post-dose sampling times on Day 1 and Day 8

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics parameters of SHR3824 and Metformin after single and multiple dose: Racc etc
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Based on pre-dose, 0.5-72 hours post-dose sampling times on Day 1 and Day 8

secondary_outcome.measure: The incidence and severity of adverse events/serious adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Based on pre-dose, 0.5-72 hours post-dose sampling times on Day 1 and Day 8

intervention.description: single HR20033 FDC tablet fed, take orally on an empty stomach and then after meals
single HR20033 FDC tablet fasted, take orally after meals and then on an empty stomach
single and multiple doses of HR20033 FDC tablet

facility.name: The Second Affiliated Hospital of Anhui Medical University
